Token.Abstract: NSData+CGMCommands constructs CGM commands or values in NSDate format to be sent is a CGM sensor
Constructs the current time value to be sent to the CGM Session Start Time characteristic

ReturnValue.Abstract: Current time value in NSData format

Token.Abstract: Joins the fluid type with the sample location into a single octet

Parameter.Name: type
Parameter.Abstract: The fluid type. See UHNCGMConstants for CGMTypeOption definition

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: The sample location. See UHNCGMConstants for CGMLocationOption definition

ReturnValue.Abstract: A sample type/location octet NSData format
